description: Phase III: Municipal Governance and Community Empowerment Programme

subproject.description:
Improved capacity of central government to decentralize fiscal and administrative powers/responsibilities in support of local development

1. Formulate policy recommendations on enabling environment for local self-governance and community-led development.
2. Develop capacity of national/local government bodies, politicians and civil servants from relevant central/municipal institutions to support participatory local development planning and decision-making.
3. Introduce knowledge management principals into the project activities. Coordinate communication and public relations. 
4. Provide advisory support and management services on the municipal development.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: SDP Central Government CD

subproject.description:
Improved capacity of central government to decentralize fiscal and administrative powers/responsibilities in support of local development

1. Formulate policy recommendations on enabling environment for local self-governance and community-led development.
2. Develop capacity of national/local government bodies, politicians and civil servants from relevant central/municipal institutions to support participatory local development planning and decision-making.
3. Introduce knowledge management principals into the project activities. Coordinate communication and public relations.

subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: SDP Central Government CD

subproject.description:
Improved capacity of local authorities to transparently define and implement local development strategies, deliver public services, and foster local economic development^

1.  Joint planning and participatory budgeting for sustainable local development methodology and manual developed

Actions:
   - Support joint planning and participatory budgeting in selected municipality;
   - Support municipality for developing strategic plan/performance-based budgeting/ISO;
   - Support municipalities for improved service delivery and community participation into local development
2. Build capacity of relevant civil servants and officials at regional and municipal level – to improve local public service delivery
3. Promoted inter-municipal cooperation for improved service delivery through joint ventures (e.g. solid waste management, health services, transport services, etc)
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: SDP Local Authorities CD

subproject.description:
Create environment for promotion of citizen-based partnership and participatory development vision.

Build capacity of target communities for participatory actions.

Raise public awareness on crucial sustainable human development agenda
